# simd_make_short32(_:_:)

**Function**

Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_make_short32(_ lo: simd_short16, _ hi: simd_short16) -> simd_short32
```

## Functions to Create Thirty Two-Element Vectors From Other Vectors
